mapper.select: SELECT qna_seq, content, sort_order, writer, group_seq, write_time, modify_time, del_flag, passwd FROM tb21_120_qna tb120 WHERE tb120.del_flag = 'N' and tb120.group_seq = (select a.group_seq from tb21_120_qna a where a.del_flag = 'N' group by a.group_seq order by a.group_seq desc limit #{limitStartPage},#{limitEndPage}) order by tb120.sort_order
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT count(*) FROM tb21_120_qna tb120 WHERE tb120.del_flag = 'N' GROUP BY tb120.group_seq) a
SELECT tb120.qna_seq, tb120.content, tb120.sort_order, tb120.writer, tb120.group_seq, tb120.write_time, tb120.modify_time, tb120.passwd FROM tb21_120_qna tb120 WHERE tb120.qna_seq = #{qna_seq}
